item.title: Minetest Deprecation Notice
item.description: Due to the upstream project rebranding, we have decided to deprecate our Minetest image. Please migrate to our new Luanti image instead.
item.content: Due to the upstream project rebranding, we have decided to deprecate our Minetest image. Please migrate to our new Luanti image instead.

item.title: New Container: Luanti
item.description:
We have released a new container for Luanti!

Luanti (formerly Minetest) is an open source voxel game-creation platform with easy modding and game creation.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Luanti!

Luanti (formerly Minetest) is an open source voxel game-creation platform with easy modding and game creation.

item.title: New Container: Minetest
item.description:
We have released a new container for Minetest!

Minetest (server) is a near-infinite-world block sandbox game and a game engine, inspired by InfiniMiner, Minecraft, and the like.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Minetest!

Minetest (server) is a near-infinite-world block sandbox game and a game engine, inspired by InfiniMiner, Minecraft, and the like.
